com.oym.indoor

Class RoutePoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oym.indoor.RoutePoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RouteProjectedPoint

    public class RoutePoint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a point that shall be used for the routing.
